p: In order to get insight into the potent antibacterial activity of the PCEO against pathogenic strains, molecular docking of the predominant and the most potent constituents were performed on the into the active site of TyrRS from S. aureus binding model based on the TyrRS complex structure (pdb code: 1jij). All interactions between the receptor and the selected ligands are outlined in Figure 6 and Table 6, respectively.
